SELECT t.id,t.accountId,t.loginTime,t.loginIP,jba.loginName as aName FROM jeegem_BASE_LOGIN_LOG t LEFT JOIN jeegem_base_account jba ON jba.id=t.accountId WHERE 1=1
AND ( t.loginIP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') OR jba.loginName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.loginTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.loginTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY t.loginTime desc
SELECT count(*) FROM jeegem_BASE_LOGIN_LOG t WHERE 1=1
